message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. Would you like to buy it from me for $90?
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm interested, but $90 is a bit high for me. Would you be willing to come down to $85?
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I can do $87.50, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
